article_title: Allysia Finley: Behind the GOP Statehouse Juggernaut
article_text:
Orlando, Fla.

The media focus on national elections, but the bigger story of 2014 may be the earthquake in the states. Republicans now hold 31 governorships, but as important and less well understood is that they will also hold more state legislative seats than at any time since 1928. These are the building blocks of national success because they train future House and Senate candidates and become laboratories for conservative...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Allysia Finley interviews Bill McCollum, chairman of the Republican State Leadership Committee.
twitter.creator: @AllysiaFinley
twitter.title: Behind the GOP Statehouse Juggernaut
